\/C:\/Users\/admin\/Desktop\/codepool\/_: 基于OpenCV.js编写一个文档扫描Web应用

The article talks about how to build a JavaScript library to use OpenCV to detect document boundaries and correct document images, which can be used with Dynamsoft Document Viewer to build a web document scanner.
本文讨论了如何构建一个使用OpenCV来检测文档边界并更正文档图像的JavaScript库。该库可与Dynamsoft Document Viewer一起用于构建文档扫描Web应用。

The article talks about how to build a JavaScript library to use OpenCV to detect document boundaries and correct document images, which can be used with Dynamsoft Document Viewer to build a web document scanner.
OpenCV is an open-source computer vision and machine learning software library.
OpenCV是一个开源的计算机视觉和机器学习软件库。
OpenCV is an open-source computer vision and machine learning software library.
It provides various image processing methods for us to solve different tasks.
它为我们解决不同的任务提供了各种图像处理方法。
It provides various image processing methods for us to solve different tasks.
In this article, we are going to build a web document scanner with the JavaScript version of OpenCV.
在本文中，我们将使用OpenCV的JavaScript版本编写一个文档扫描Web应用。
In this article, we are going to build a web document scanner with the JavaScript version of OpenCV.

A JavaScript library is made first and then used together with <g1>Dynamsoft Document Viewer</g1> to create a document scanner with features like live detection, auto capture, and document polygon editing.
首先编写了一个JavaScript库，然后与<g1>Dynamsoft Document Viewer</g1>一起使用，实现一个具有实时检测、自动捕获和文档多边形编辑等功能的文档扫描应用。

A JavaScript library is made first and then used together with <g1>Dynamsoft Document Viewer</g1> to create a document scanner with features like live detection, auto capture, and document polygon editing.

使用Vite创建一个新的TypeScript项目：

In <g1>index.html</g1> which is used for development, include OpenCV.
在用于开发测试的<g1>index.html</g1>中，包含OpenCV。
In <g1>index.html</g1> which is used for development, include OpenCV.
Next, create a <g1>document-scanner.ts</g1> file for the <g2>DocumentScanner</g2> class.
Next, create a <g1>document-scanner.ts</g1> file for the <g2>DocumentScanner</g2> class.
In the constructor, add a property called <g1>cv</g1> to use the <g2>cv</g2> namespace to perform related functions.
在构造函数中，添加一个名为<g1>cv</g1>的属性，以使用<g2>cv</g2>命名空间来执行相关函数。
In the constructor, add a property called <g1>cv</g1> to use the <g2>cv</g2> namespace to perform related functions.
Next, add a <g1>detect</g1> method to return the four corner points of a document.
接下来，添加<g1>detect</g1>方法以返回文档的四个角点。
Next, add a <g1>detect</g1> method to return the four corner points of a document.
Then, let's implement the method in steps.
然后，让我们分步骤实现该方法。
Then, let's implement the method in steps.
Read the image as mat from an image element or a canvas element.
从img或canvas读取图像为OpenCV用的mat类型。
Read the image as mat from an image element or a canvas element.
Perform Gaussian blur to remove noise.
执行高斯模糊以去除噪点。
Perform Gaussian blur to remove noise.
Perform threshold to get a binary image.
执行threshold操作以获得二值化的图像。
Perform threshold to get a binary image.
Find the contours and get the biggest one as the document candidate.
寻找轮廓并将最大的轮廓作为候选文档。
Find the contours and get the biggest one as the document candidate.
Get the corner points by calculating the distance of points to the center point.
通过计算点到中心点的距离来获得角点。
Get the corner points by calculating the distance of points to the center point.
Store them in an array according to the clockwise direction.
将它们按顺时针方向存储在一个数组中。
Store them in an array according to the clockwise direction.
Release the memory and return the points.
Release the memory and return the points.
Next, add a <g1>crop</g1> method to run perspective transformation to get a deskewed and cropped image.
接下来，添加一个<g1>crop</g1>方法来运行透视变换，以获得一个矫正好的图像。
Next, add a <g1>crop</g1> method to run perspective transformation to get a deskewed and cropped image.
Let's talk about the details in steps.
让我们分步骤讨论实现细节。
Let's talk about the details in steps.
Run <g1>detect</g1> to get the points if it is not provided in the argument.
如果参数中没有预先提供角点，运行<g1>detect</g1>以获取文档的角点。
Run <g1>detect</g1> to get the points if it is not provided in the argument.
Determine the width and height of the output image.
确定输出图像的宽度和高度。
Determine the width and height of the output image.
If the width and height are not specified by the user, then use the longest vertical edge for the height and the longest horizontal edge for the width.
如果用户未指定宽度和高度，则使用最长的垂直边提供高度，使用最长的水平边提供宽度。
If the width and height are not specified by the user, then use the longest vertical edge for the height and the longest horizontal edge for the width.
Draw the result into a canvas element.
Draw the result into a canvas element.
Release the memory and return the canvas.
Release the memory and return the canvas.
We can now use the document scanner to get the cropped document image.
我们现在可以使用这个类来获取裁剪后的文档图像。
We can now use the document scanner to get the cropped document image.
Web Document Scanner with Dynamsoft Document Viewer
基于Dynamsoft Document Viewer的文档扫描Web应用
Web Document Scanner with Dynamsoft Document Viewer
Dynamsoft Document Viewer provides several viewers for the document scanning process.
Dynamsoft Document Viewer为文档扫描过程提供了多个组件。
Dynamsoft Document Viewer provides several viewers for the document scanning process.
We can use its <g1>Capture Viewer</g1> to create a live document scanner with the camera and its <g2>Perspective Viewer</g2> to edit the detected document polygon.
我们可以使用它的<g1>Capture Viewer</g1>实现带有相机控制的实时文档扫描功能，并使用它的<g2>Perspective Viewer</g2>编辑检测到的文档多边形。
We can use its <g1>Capture Viewer</g1> to create a live document scanner with the camera and its <g2>Perspective Viewer</g2> to edit the detected document polygon.
Dynamsoft Document Viewer allows integrating third-party document-detecting libraries by defining a processing handler.
Dynamsoft Document Viewer允许通过定义handler来集成第三方文档检测库。
Dynamsoft Document Viewer allows integrating third-party document-detecting libraries by defining a processing handler.
You can find an example of using Dynamsoft Document Normalizer <g1>here</g1>.
可以在<g1>此处</g1>找到使用Dynamsoft Document Normalizer的示例。
You can find an example of using Dynamsoft Document Normalizer <g1>here</g1>.
We are going to write a processing handler for the OpenCV version we just created so that we can use Capture Viewer to scan documents.
我们将编写一个handler，以便使用刚编写的OpenCV的文档检测类和Capture Viewer来扫描文档。
We are going to write a processing handler for the OpenCV version we just created so that we can use Capture Viewer to scan documents.
Capture Viewer can open the camera, draw the detected document boundaries and automatically take a photo if the detected results are steady.
Capture Viewer可以打开相机，绘制检测到的文档边界，并在检测结果稳定的时候自动拍照。
Capture Viewer can open the camera, draw the detected document boundaries and automatically take a photo if the detected results are steady.

Create a new file named <g1>dynamsoft-document-viewer-handler.ts</g1> with the following template:
Scale down the image if its height is larger than 720 pixels to improve performance.
如果图像的高度大于720像素，缩小图像以提高性能。
Scale down the image if its height is larger than 720 pixels to improve performance.
Draw the image data onto a canvas for OpenCV to use.
将图像数据绘制到canvas上以供OpenCV使用。
Draw the image data onto a canvas for OpenCV to use.
Post process and return the results.
Post process and return the results.
The <g1>processDetectResult</g1> method will check whether the detected polygon's size is like a document.
使用<g1>processDetectResult</g1>处理结果，它能检查检测到的多边形的形状是否接近文档的形状。
The <g1>processDetectResult</g1> method will check whether the detected polygon's size is like a document.

使用Capture Viewer捕获文档图像

It works well scanning a white document on a dark background.
在深色背景下扫描白色文档的效果很好。
It works well scanning a white document on a dark background.
But it does not scanning on a complex background.
但背景复杂的话效果就不行了。
But it does not scanning on a complex background.
For more complicated cases, we can use Dynamsoft Document Normalizer instead to achieve a better result.
